content: ललाम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (मी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Beautiful, lovely, charming. {@--2@} Having a mark on the forehead marked with a blaze. --मं {@--1@} An ornament for the forehead, an ornament or decoration in general; ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} also in this sense); अहं तु तामाश्रमललामभूतां शकुंतलामधिकृत्य ब्रवीमि <ls>Ś. 2</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Anything the best of its kind. {@--3@} A mark on the forehead. {@--4@} A sign, symbol, mark in general. {@--5@} A banner, flag. {@--6@} A row, series, line. {@--7@} A tail. {@--8@} A mane. {@--9@} Eminence, dignity, beauty. {@--10@} A horn. --मः A horse.
